content:
From breakfast in The Terrace, with its captivating city views rivaling rooftop restaurants in New York, to the Hours of Indulgence in The Den, it is little moments of sophisticated indulgence that elevate the everyday at WestHouse. Hotel Residents enjoy these complimentary culinary privileges throughout their stay, a rare and exceptional offering among luxury hotels in New York. And with an enviable location in the very heart of the worldâ€™s most food-centric city, WestHouse Hotel New York Residents can gain coveted reservations at famed Manhattan restaurants.

Resident dining privileges include:

Sweet and Savory breakfast presentations in The Terrace

  • Weekdays between 6.30am and 10.30am
  • Weekends between 7.00am and 11.00am

Barista bar and non-alcoholic beverages in The Terrace

  • Weekdays between 6.30am and 10.30am
  • Weekends between 7.00am and 11.00am

Light fare and a curated selection of alcoholic* beverages served during Hours of Indulgence in The Den

  • Daily between 5.00pm and 8.00pm

*WestHouse Hotel New York pours the finest quality spirits such as Hudson Whiskey, Manhattan Rye, Louis the 13th Cognac, Johnny Walker Blue, McAllen 18, Roca Patron, and more. Featured Champagnes include Perrier Jouet, Dom Perignon or Roederer Cristal.
